paper_metadata.title: Germline mutational spectrum in Armenian breast cancer patients suspected of hereditary breast and ovarian cancer
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the BRCA2 gene along with penetrance data from the study.

patients.demographics: Female, age not specified, Armenian descent

individual_records.evidence_sentence: We found four patients in this patient cohort that did not report any family history of cancer yet had pathogenic or likely pathogenic variants identified.

functional_data.summary: The variant is a frameshift mutation leading to a truncated protein.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on pathogenic classification
variants.additional_notes: This variant was identified in a patient with bilateral breast cancer.
key_quotes: We found four patients in this patient cohort that did not report any family history of cancer yet had pathogenic or likely pathogenic variants identified.
